ProductPriceHistoryLog.name: ProductPriceHistoryLog
ProductPriceHistoryLog.description: Stores historical pricing data based on the product's price range.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: ISO code for any currency allowed by the organization. Available only for organizations with the multicurrency feature enabled.

Date.description: The date when the product price history log record is created.

LastReferencedDate.description: Indicates whether the product price history log has been archived (true) or not (false). This field is read-only.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Required. The name of the product price history log.

TrackedPrice.description: The price for a product recorded for a particular date.
